newsitem.title: USA: US reiterates it continues Microsoft probe.
newsitem.headline: US reiterates it continues Microsoft probe.

text.p: A senior Justice Department official reiterated on Wednesday that the department was continuing its investigation of Microsoft Corp and its adherence to a consent decree that was issued last year.
Asked about complaints that the big software maker was violating the consent order, Assistant Attorney General Anne Bingaman said "there has been an on-going investigation" of Microsoft.
Bingaman made no other comment on Microsoft. A reporter raised the matter during a press conference on new antitrust guidelines for the healthcare industry.
